channel.title: Comments on: How to Stay Healthy While Traveling

item.title: By: Lana Sierra Rocha
item.dc:creator: Lana Sierra Rocha
item.description: And don’t forget to take sun spray to protect your skin.
item.content:encoded: And don’t forget to take sun spray to protect your skin.

item.title: By: Stacy Palmer
item.dc:creator: Stacy Palmer
item.description: Very useful tips, thank you! We are planning to go on a vacation and will for sure follow all the recommendations.
item.content:encoded: Very useful tips, thank you! We are planning to go on a vacation and will for sure follow all the recommendations.
